Package org.lrdm

package org.lrdm
Package containing the domain classes of the simulator (e.g., Mirror and Link).
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.lrdm.effectors
    Package containing the Effector to add Adaptation Action to the simulation.
    org.lrdm.examples
    Package containing example usages of the framework.
    org.lrdm.probes
    Package containing the probes offered by the framework to observe its execution.
    org.lrdm.topologies
    Package containing topology strategies of the simulator.
    org.lrdm.util
    Package for utility classes.
  • Class
    Description
    DataPackage
    Represents a single data package to be held by mirrors.
    GraphVisualization
    Graphical visualisation of the simulator using the GraphStream library.
    Link
    A link between two mirrors.
    Link.State
     
    Mirror
    A single mirror in an RDM network.
    Mirror.State
     
    Network
    An RDM Network.
    TimedRDMSim
    Latency-aware simulator for remote data mirroring (Latency-aware RDM).
    VisualizationStrategy
    Interface for visualization strategies for the simulator.
